column1: Table 9--Corn and sorghum: Average prices received by farmers, United States

1/ September-August.  Latest data may be preliminary or projected.
2/ Weighted average is the U.S. season-average price based on monthly price received by farmers weighted by monthly marketings.

Prices do not include an allowance for loans outstanding and government purchases.  Latest data are from 
World Supply and Demand Estimates.

Source: USDA, National Agricultural Statistics Service, Agricultural Prices: and USDA, World Agricultural Outlook Board,
World Supply and Demand Estimates.
